Recipes Utils¶

recipes.utils.get_graph(fig)¶

Get a base64-encoded graph image from a Matplotlib figure.

Parameters:

fig – Matplotlib figure.

Returns:

Base64-encoded graph image.

recipes.utils.get_recipe_difficulty_distribution_data(request, type_of_recipe='default')¶

Count the occurrence of each difficulty for data visualization.

Parameters:

  • request – The HTTP request.

  • type_of_recipe – Filter by a specific recipe type.

Returns:

DataFrame with difficulty and count columns.

recipes.utils.get_recipe_name_from_id(value)¶

Retrieve the name of a recipe given its ID.

Parameters:

value – The ID of the recipe.

Returns:

The name of the recipe or an error message if the recipe is not found.
